H0.text: when did the twenty one pilots hiatus start. January 2016

H1.text: when did the twenty one pilots hiatus start. October 2015

H2.text: when did the twenty one pilots hiatus start. March 2018

H3.text: when did the twenty one pilots hiatus start. July 2017

A4.text: In July 2018, Twenty One Pilots broke their year-long silence, first sending a cryptic email to fans and later posting a video to all social media platforms and updating their logo and branding.

A5.text: The band's last activity came in July 2017 in the form of posts on social media depicting an eye closing over lyrics from several of their songs.
